price: 60. »Mas si no lo traéis, no os abasteceré más y no os acercaréis a mí».
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
